short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add comments to Instagram stories, to Netflix content,... literally anywhere you want!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eccco is an alternative version for the whole internet. Eccco allows you to expand the information of any url in a decentralized way. Using "share with" available in any mobile device you can access extra features for that url. Those features are based on text for now, but much more is coming! Join us and be a part of the second layer of internet.
